entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
